title: Bug: Google Play-Systemupdate loop?!
content:
Hello, I use a Pixel 3a, it's not the first time I've observed this, I already experienced the same thing with the January update, the security updates are installed successfully, but there are problems with the google play system update!

I press restart, but after the restart it wants to restart again, already tried several times, there is no error message, the google play store shows me that everything is up to date!



Every time i click on the Google Play-Systemupdate it tell me to restart to finish.
